description: This file defines an Angular standalone component called 'InputFieldComponent' that serves as a reusable input field with label, validation, and styling features. It implements ControlValueAccessor for form integration and manages user input, validation states, and accessibility attributes.

classes.name: InputFieldComponent
classes.description: A reusable Angular component for input fields with label, validation, and styling.

methods.name: writeValue
methods.description: Updates the component's value from the form model.

methods.name: registerOnChange
methods.description: Registers a callback function to propagate changes back to the form model.

methods.name: registerOnTouched
methods.description: Registers a callback function to mark the control as touched.

methods.name: setDisabledState
methods.description: Enables or disables the input field.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles the input event, updating internal value and emitting change events.
